## Pre-launch Checklist

- [ ] I have run `flutter format` on all changed files <!-- THIS IS REQUIRED -->
- [ ] I have updated `CHANGELOG.md` with my changes <!-- THIS IS REQUIRED -->

- [ ] I have addressed all analyzer warnings as best I could
